feedback_questions.question: Do you find it challenging to select outfits on a daily basis?
Do you face challenges in selecting outfits for special occasions?
How much time do you spend on average selecting an outfit?
What do you consider your biggest challenges with outfit selection?
options: Feeling confident in what I wear
I am very confident with selecting my outfits

feedback_questions.question: How often do you feel satisfied with the outfits you choose?
Approximately what percentage of your wardrobe do you regularly use?
Where do you typically get inspiration for your outfits?
How confident are you in understanding your personal style?
How important is it for your style to reflect current fashion trends?
Do you feel your wardrobe reflects your personality?
When buying new clothes, how often do you consider how they will match items already in your wardrobe?
Would you be interested in an app that helps you identify and build your personal style?
What kind of advice would you find most useful in an app? (Select all that apply)
options: Styling inspiration based on my current wardrobe
Guidance on dressing for my body shape
Advice on accessorizing and completing a look
Tips for creating a capsule wardrobe
